title: Lead Frontend Developer
about: Lead Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience specializing in React and Next.js. Expert in architecting and building scalable, high-performance applications from the ground up. Proven track record in technical leadership, mentoring junior developers, and driving projects to successful launch. Strong advocate for clean code, robust architecture, and modern development practices.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
desc: Portfolio website. For more information about projects please visit danielfijolek.com.

projects.name: Webtail React Boilerplate
desc: React Boilerplate with Webpack and Babel. Preconfigured with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, ESlint and Prettier.

projects.name: Exercise Tracker
desc: In an effort to expand my backend development skills, I developed an 'Exercise Tracker' application using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript. The application is built around a RESTful API with data validation and offers endpoints to create and retrieve user data, as well as to log and fetch information about user exercises.

projects.name: Twitter Clone
desc: A personal project initiated as a learning playground to explore and master React Query. Built with React, TypeScript, React Query, Axios, and TailwindCSS, with user-friendly features such as creating accounts and secure login.

projects.name: Smart sprout cultivation system
desc: As part of my thesis, I developed a web application to control an intelligent sprout cultivation system. This project, commissioned by Nlightnin Production company, was built using React and a Firebase database. The application, designed with React, React Router, JavaScript, and CSS3, provides a user-friendly interface for managing the cultivation system. The project was managed using the Scrum methodology, ensuring clear communication and timely deliveries.

projects.name: Diet controlling web application
desc: Leveraging vanilla JavaScript on the frontend and Node.js with Express.js on the backend, I created a seamless connection between the user interface and the server. The application featured a secure administrator panel with login capabilities for managing user accounts and ensuring data integrity and security.
